Reviews.Title: Aa 3G cell phone, easy to handle, plenty of extras to use if you want them or not if you don't.
Reviews.Author: smoothdeb
Reviews.Content: This is a LG, which I consider the best or one of them. It has crystal clear reception, and gets reception when no one else can pick one up. This particular phone has a basic front, but only all of the features can be accessed by using the qwerky keyboard. So you have to open it up to utilize all of it's features. And there are plenty of them! Right now I am using their GPS navigator to drive New York and D.C. without much hitches. I don't use the on-line features, but they would be easy to get to if I did. So a 3G cell phone that can be used as a smart phone or a regular phone. Can't get much better than that.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone! But this particular one has problems
Reviews.Author: Suki
Reviews.Content: I got this phone because i love the model. I ordered again since the old one got broken and the shipping and everything was good, the only thing is the refurbish phone started to malfunction in two weeks. I try to contact the seller 3 times and they do not respond. I lost my money since nobody help me with the issue. I will not contact this seller again. Very bad service.

Reviews.Title: Almost Great
Reviews.Author: akay
Reviews.Content: The phone was as described except some of the previous owner's pictures were left on there, just human error there. The only issue I have with the phone now is several times a day (sometimes up to 20 times) I get a messages from Verizon that says *high* it is really annoying. Other than those two things the phone was received as advertised.

Reviews.Title: sounds/looks great
Reviews.Author: T. Williams "Texas Tea"
Reviews.Content: Verizon doesn't offer their customers any descent "basic" phones anymore.  It's like they're forcing you to upgrade to a 4G with computer access whether you want (need) it or not.  This was a great solution.  My teenage dghtr now has a pretty phone, with a full keyboard and she also says it takes GREAT pics. as well.

Reviews.Title: very compact and yet very functional
Reviews.Author: more
Reviews.Content: Dual keypad, Internal one for text messaging and internet browser, like a mini-lap-top you can put it on desk don't have to type with one finger thanks for prompt shipping thanks jason

Reviews.Title: Good company
Reviews.Author: Rocco
Reviews.Content: Everything was shipped early and product worked great. I have no problems with the product so far. I look forward to doing more business in the future.

Reviews.Title: Xmas present for my 12 yr old daughter
Reviews.Author: Leesa
Reviews.Content: So far so good bought it for Xmas for my daughter n I even bought her the stickers on amazon instead of a bulky vase n she loved both! Hit the jackpot she totally digs this phone!

Reviews.Title: Env3
Reviews.Author: glenn
Reviews.Content: Easy to use. Battery stays charged for a long time. Buttons are user friendly and big enough not to hit wrong combos

Reviews.Title: Nice phone
Reviews.Author: jim peachey
Reviews.Content: This phone is all I expected. The charge lasts several days. The only problem I've had is with the texting. If you are getting ready to send a text and recieve one at the same time it gets all mixed up and you lose both the incoming text and the one you are working on is put in the inbox.  Otherwise its good.

Reviews.Title: Fine while it lasted but did not work longer than six weeks
Reviews.Author: Diane C
Reviews.Content: I got the phone so that my son in college could stay in touch with us and within six weeks the phone no longer made noise when it rang so if he was not looking at it he could not tell if he had a call. Shortly after that it stoped working altogether.

Reviews.Title: lg enve vx9200 maroon cell phone
Reviews.Author: shirley
Reviews.Content: cell phone is very good and i love ithave no trouble with it at al,l ,would get another if i need to

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Beck
Reviews.Content: This phone worked well. It doesn't look like it but it is a smart phone and does require a data plan. Using the internet with it is pretty much worthless though. Calling and Texting works just fine and that is what I used it for.

Reviews.Title: Best Phone Ever.....
Reviews.Author: Terri K.
Reviews.Content: My daughter had this phone ages ago but when she finally dropped it for the last time and we tried to replace it Verizon tried to say that we needed a data plan if we bought another one.  I guess they lost a lot of business over this because now you can buy a Verizon compatible phone online and you can have them activate it without renewing (or starting a new) contract with them.  I bought two spare phones to make sure I have one for many many years.

Reviews.Title: Simple and good
Reviews.Author: T. Baker
Reviews.Content: No fancy smart phone here.  I didn't want a smart phone, just something to text and talk.  This fits the job description well.

Reviews.Title: So happy to find one just like the one I lost!!! don't have a lot of frufru on it and works great!!! most convient...
Reviews.Author: M. Burrow
Reviews.Content: So happy to find one just like the one I lost!!! don't have a lot of frufru on it and works great!!! most convient...

Reviews.Title: LG enV3 phone
Reviews.Author: Terrie Cervera
Reviews.Content: Love it! Was everything they said and I received it ahead of the date scheduled to received which was a great surprise since my original phone was stolen I was in need of a phone.

Reviews.Title: Great phone when it worked!
Reviews.Author: James L. Torkelson
Reviews.Content: Sorry to say the phone is defective...won't stay on and drops off and turns on again by itself. Battery fully charged...makes no difference. Will be returning the device...and will check for a different phone. Maybe its time for the iPhone!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: LG enV3 VX9200 Maroon Verizon Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: H.C.Hildebrandt
Reviews.Content: The phone is adequate for my needs. I had an android smart phone and never did use many of it's features and had to pay for much more data than I would ever use. Purchased this phone as a suitable replacement. It does have many good features and is easy to text with. The two problems I have are it will "butt dial" and it has several times and the battery runs down very quickly, an apparent common problem. I haven't figured out how to stop the battery drain as yet other than turn it off, so the phone lasts all day. Other than that, it is a nice phone.

Reviews.Title: Great Cell Phone!
Reviews.Author: Diane H.
Reviews.Content: I found this cell phone at Amazon and purchased it online about a month ago from Applewireless. So far I'm thrilled with it!  Love the look and feel of the phone.. it's very cute and stylish! I don't understand why Verizon discontinued this particular model for those who may want the basic talk and text features, which is a lot nicer looking than the present basic cell phones they are now offering. I decided to switch from my LG Smartphone, and I'm really glad I did. I wanted a phone that functions more like an actual phone. I don't need all the bells and whistles that comes with a Smartphone, as I have enough devices with a variety of features that satisfies all of that, without the added expense of all the required data and more.  I now have a good quality functioning phone, which costs considerably less per month and delivers the goods! It holds a charge better than the Smartphone. I had inquired here online about whether this had e-mail capability, and by the way, I wanted to thank all of those people who shared in their comments about that feature here at Amazon.  It does have email capability and web capability, but it's pretty limited. In retrospect, I don't really miss it. I have other ways to handle that function, and I find that the text messaging feature is quite adequate. All in all, I just like not having to climb a mountain to figure out how to answer the phone or worry about whether the phone has lost much or most of its charge at the end of the day. This was a chronic problem and my experience with dealing with the Smartphone. I don't really like the virtual keyboard either. I found I ended up using a Logitech Blue Tooth Keyboard for any type of text messaging.(By the way that Logic Tech Keyboard is the best little keyboard I've ever used!) Virtual keyboards are good in small doses, but not great for accurate and swift typing. The reception on the LGEnv is awesome!The Verizon staff simply made the switch and took care of everything, including keeping my pictures and my contact list, for a modest charge of $10.00.Overall I feel I made a "Smart Choice" to lose the "Smart Phone" and stay with something that works like a phone. I think this phone the LG Env3VX9200 should be called the "New Smart Phone".

Reviews.Title: Great Buy!
Reviews.Author: Fashion Mom
Reviews.Content: My son loves this phone.  Bought it as a gift and wasn't sure if the color would be boyish enough, dark enough or whatever, but he loved it and I would recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Tony Parng
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my mom because she likes the fact it's simple and straight forward! I got the dark red and she loved it. Perfect condition from my buyer and even came with instructions for verizon set up. Takes really great pictures for a old phone as well! Thank you

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Angelica Villavicencio
Reviews.Content: It was in the condition I was told and it works perfectly. Very pleased with it. Thank you very much.

Reviews.Title: Works for me!
Reviews.Author: Melinda Dillow Puckett
Reviews.Content: The phone works great for me! I need only for texting and calls - no data pkg, so its great!
